definition[0]: a machine that passes an electrical beam over something in order to produce a picture of what is inside it
definition[1]: a piece of computer equipment that allows written or printed information to be taken onto a computer and stored there
definition[2]: a machine that passes an electronic BEAM over something in order to read information on it or produce a picture of what is inside
example[1]: Customers simply have to wave the productâ€™s bar code under a scanner.
definition[3]: a piece of computer equipment that copies words or images from paper onto the computer
example[3]: The store sells color printers and scanners for desk-top publishing.
